title: Integrated Cognitive Learning Principles Intervention Program for Graduate Students with Mathematics Learning Difficulties

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Arithmetic Skills and Understanding of Fundamental Scientific Concepts
context.additional_context: Short intensive programs for graduate students in medical/legal/technical fields, conducted in mobile-based microlearning environments. Learners possess advanced domain expertise but struggle with mathematical concept application.

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 80% accuracy in solving integer concept problems through explicit instruction-based math interventions.
Learners systematically solve complex math problems using a three-step or more approach by integrating Cognitive Learning Principles (CLPs).
Learners achieve a weekly average content completion rate of over 90% in mobile microlearning environments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
